apps.title: QuadStream
apps.description:
Watch four streams or videos simultaneously with split screen. Set any of the streams to fullscreen while keeping the other streams running (configurable).

Quickly switch between Twitch streams by accessing ongoing streams on Twitch channels with twitch:channel shorthand instead of the full stream URL.

Manage your streams or favorites online – check out the stream dashboard at quadstream.tv/stream and the favorites dashboard at quadstream.tv/favorites

QuadStream 2.0 brings the legendary tvOS app also for iPadOS and macOS, and 2.1.0 adds support for iOS. New features include a discover menu for finding publicly available streams by country and easier access to the app settings.

Main features:
• up to four simultaneous streams or videos with split screen
• set any of the streams to fullscreen
• mute or stop streams separately
• videos loop automatically
• disconnected streams reconnect automatically
• access ongoing Twitch streams with twitch:channel shorthand
• remembers stream sources, mute and stop states
• add stream sources to favorites list
• rename favorite labels in the favorites menu with a favorite list button long press
• manage your streams online at quadstream.tv/stream
• manage your favorites online at quadstream.tv/favorites
• find publicly available streams by country in the discover view

The main streaming format is HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) which is supported by all major live streaming services.

Note: RTSP, RTMP and RTP protocols are not currently supported. Valid protocols include HTTP and HTTPS.

The full list of supported MIME types:

application/mp4
application/vnd.apple.mpegurl
application/x-mpegurl

video/3gpp
video/3gpp2
video/avi
video/mp4
video/quicktime
video/x-m4v

audio/3gpp

audio/mp4
audio/mpeg

audio/mpg
audio/scpls
audio/wav
audio/wave

raw_data.releaseNotes: Adds support for iOS devices.
raw_data.description:
Watch four streams or videos simultaneously with split screen. Set any of the streams to fullscreen while keeping the other streams running (configurable).

Quickly switch between Twitch streams by accessing ongoing streams on Twitch channels with twitch:channel shorthand instead of the full stream URL.

Manage your streams or favorites online – check out the stream dashboard at quadstream.tv/stream and the favorites dashboard at quadstream.tv/favorites

QuadStream 2.0 brings the legendary tvOS app also for iPadOS and macOS, and 2.1.0 adds support for iOS. New features include a discover menu for finding publicly available streams by country and easier access to the app settings.

Main features:
• up to four simultaneous streams or videos with split screen
• set any of the streams to fullscreen
• mute or stop streams separately
• videos loop automatically
• disconnected streams reconnect automatically
• access ongoing Twitch streams with twitch:channel shorthand
• remembers stream sources, mute and stop states
• add stream sources to favorites list
• rename favorite labels in the favorites menu with a favorite list button long press
• manage your streams online at quadstream.tv/stream
• manage your favorites online at quadstream.tv/favorites
• find publicly available streams by country in the discover view

The main streaming format is HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) which is supported by all major live streaming services.

Note: RTSP, RTMP and RTP protocols are not currently supported. Valid protocols include HTTP and HTTPS.

The full list of supported MIME types:

application/mp4

apps.title: STARZ ON
apps.description:
STARZPLAY — One App. Endless Entertainment.
Explore a world of movies, series, and live TV channels at your fingertips. Watch for free, or upgrade to STARZPLAY MAX to unlock exclusive blockbusters, original productions, and the biggest live sports — all in one app.
Enjoy Free Entertainment
Enjoy a vast library of ad-supported movies, series, and documentaries — no registration or subscription required.
Stream Free TV Channels
Enjoy 50+ live and digital channels curated for every taste. Watch nonstop movie channels, stay updated with the latest news, binge game show channels, or explore fan-favorite celebrity channels dedicated to iconic stars and their legendary work.
Go Premium with STARZPLAY MAX

Unlock unlimited, ad-free access to Hollywood hits, the latest originals, Arabic and Turkish favorites, anime, documentaries, same-time-as-the-US series, kids’ programs, and live sports.

Stream STARZPLAY Originals like Harley, Kaboos, and Million Dollar Listing UAE, or fan-favorites like Young Sheldon, Kurulus: Osman, The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon, The Walking Dead: Dead City, El Turco, The Good Doctor, Naruto and The Flash. 

Plus live sports including Serie A, UFC, PFL, ICC T20 World Cup , IPL, Six Nations, PGA Tour Golf, AEW, boxing and more.

Explore the STARZPLAY Store to buy or rent direct-from-cinema releases — and watch them anytime, anywhere, bringing the latest blockbusters straight to your screen.

Key Features

Stream your way: Watch for free now or upgrade for premium content and live sports. Buy or rent the latest cinema releases or browse live/digital channels.
Extensive library: From timeless classics to new releases across genres.
Personalized recommendations: Tailored to your taste to keep your feed fresh.
Multiple devices: Compatible with phones, tablets, TVs, and desktops. Register up to 5 devices, stream on 2 simultaneously.
4K / Full HD & offline mode: Stream in top quality or download for offline viewing.
Seamless experience: An intuitive interface that makes discovery and watching effortless.

Join STARZPLAY and enjoy free and premium entertainment — all in one app. Download now and start watching!

Privacy Policy: https://starzplay.com/en/privacypolicy
Terms & Conditions: https://starzplay.com/en/termsandconditions

apps.title: iCam - Webcam Video Streaming
apps.description:
iCam allows you to remotely monitor multiple live video and audio webcam feeds from your iPhone, iPod touch or iPad over WiFi and EDGE/3G/4G/LTE.

iCam also includes support for iCam Cloud, a service that automatically backs up iCamSource motion events to the cloud as soon as they are recorded. Event backups can then be easily viewed from iCam or the web if the iCamSource ever goes offline or the computer is stolen. 

iCam has been featured on the Today Show, CNN, and Good Morning America in addition to the "Dog Lover" iPhone TV Ad - http://skjm.com/news.php

Popular uses include baby monitor, pet cam, nanny cam, spy cam, and security camera.

Record and playback Motion Events and Receive Push Notifications on your iPhone, iPod touch, or iPad when Motion is Detected by your iCamSource(s) - Visit http://skjm.com/icam/vid.php for video demonstrations.

Please note that to use iCam you will also need to download the free iCamSource software from http://skjm.com/icam/ or purchase our iCamSource Mobile app.

The iCamSource software supports Windows Vista/7/8/10 and macOS 10.9 and later. iCamSource Mobile supports camera-enabled iOS devices running iOS 8.2 or later.

iCam users also have access to iCamWeb, allowing you to connect to your iCamSource(s) from most any modern, Java-enabled web browser : http://skjm.com/icam/web/

NOTICE: If you are ever having issues please contact support instead of just leaving a bad review as we have no way of contacting you to help resolve your problem. Thanks!

You can also visit http://skjm.com/icam/support.php#faq for a list of other Frequently Asked Questions.

*** iCam Pro, the next generation of iCam, is also available! ***

iCam Pro features improved video quality, improved bandwidth usage, and many other features. Please visit http://skjm.com/icampro/ for more information.

The iCam Cloud service requires the purchase of a Cloud Storage auto-renewable subscription. There are three subscription levels available, starting  at US$4.99/month for 5 GB of event storage. Please visit http://skjm.com/icam/help/cloud.php for more information, including links to the iCam Cloud Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

The optional Unlimited Private Proxy Data auto-renewable subscription is currently US$4.99/month and can be canceled at any time. For more information on Proxy Support, please visit http://skjm.com/icam/help/proxy.php

Terms of Use: http://skjm.com/icam/terms.php
Privacy Policy: http://skjm.com/privacy.php

About Auto-Renewing Subscriptions:

- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Fixes an issue introduced in 2.9.3 that would cause the wrong camera to zoom in to a black screen.

apps.title: MusicStreamer
apps.description:
Rediscover your Music Library with MusicStreamer.

"One of the best music streaming apps available for the iOS operating system." - appPicker.com
"A smart, new app that makes local music streaming easier than ever." - AppAdvice.com
“A fantastic answer to a common problem” - 148Apps

Do you have a music collection with thousands of files on your PC, Mac, Network Drive or Time Capsule?
Now you can play that music directly on your iPad / iPhone without syncing.

MusicStreamer will scan your music, display beautiful album artwork and is a joy to use.

Our setup wizard will have you connected to your music in no time.
Create multiple music collections such as your main collection at home and a WiFi drive in the car. Easily switch between them.

Easily create and edit new playlists.
Import Playlists. MusicStreamer can import m3u and m3u8 playlist files.
Export MusicStreamer playlists to iTunes.

Filter your music by genre or search for your favorite song, artist or album.

Download tracks, albums or playlists to play when offline.

Stream your music to Airplay enabled speakers or Chromecast devices, including Chromecast groups such as your whole house.

MusicStreamer plays lossless FLAC, OPUS and WAV files as well as MP3, M4A, AAC and AIF.
Supports gapless playback.
Scrobble to last.fm.
Audiobus and inter-app audio support, acting as a music source.

We would love to hear your feedback at support@stratospherix.com and this will drive new features in future updates.

To find out more visit our website www.stratospherix.com/products/musicstreamer/
For support email support@stratospherix.com

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We try to maintain support for older iOS/iPadOS versions as long as possible, but this update and future ones require iOS 15 or later.

* Now supports latest iPadOS app resizing.
* New Sleep Timer feature.
* Added Playback Indicator on Pause button.
* Can now extract metadata from WAV files.
* Added Clear Play Queue button.

If you like MusicStreamer on iOS, MusicStreamer for Mac is available on the Mac App Store.

Rest assured, we never gather any of your data.

Thanks for using MusicStreamer.

We would love to hear your feedback at support@stratospherix.com and this will drive new features in future updates.

apps.title: LiveOne Music
apps.description:
LiveOne is the best deal in music. Lean back and enjoy your favorite music and podcasts, plus watch video and live streaming content for FREE, all in one place. 

Our massive music catalogue and passionate team of actual music lovers are focused on delivering an easy-to-use streaming app with a human touch. Enjoy our expertly-curated stations or create your own personalized listening experience with our innovative custom filters and controls.

Download the LiveOne app and you’ll get:

• FREE access to music, podcasts, and videos
• Hundreds of interactive and hand-crafted music stations: Rock, hip hop, pop, country, dance, Latin, and beyond
• Music recommendations personalized just for you, so you can discover new favorites
• Original hosted audio and video shows, including weekly countdowns, artist-hosted stations, and exclusive series like The Count Up and Artist DNA
• Over 400,000 hours of podcast episodes: True crime, comedy, reality TV, and much more
• The ability to easily collect and share your favorite songs
• The power to create your own stations and playlists
• Unique interactive news and sports programming
• On-demand access to millions of songs and albums with subscription
• Offline data-free listening on mobile with subscription


Check out LiveOne.com and follow @liveone on social media for announcements about new music stations and shows, podcasts, new features, and more.

Want to get the most out of LiveOne?

Become a LiveOne Basic member:

• Handcrafted music stations
• Original Shows & Podcasts 
• Personalized Recommendations
• It’s FREE to join!


Become a LiveOne Plus member:

• All the benefits of Basic
• Ad-free listening
• Maximum audio quality
• Unlimited skips
• Auto renews monthly at $3.99 USD


Become a LiveOne Premium member:

• All the benefits of LiveOne Plus
• Listen offline
• Play millions of songs and albums on demand
• Create your own playlists and stations
• Auto renews monthly at $9.99 USD


For all subscriptions, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account only after confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period with no change in price.

Your subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.


Privacy policy: https://www.liveone.com/privacy

Terms of use: https://www.liveone.com/terms

apps.title: Upflix - Streaming Heads Up
apps.description:
Upflix is a guide that helps you discover where your favorite movies and shows are available on the streaming platforms you already subscribe to.

Upflix is great tool for keeping up with releases and discovering where to watch your favorite content on the largest streaming platforms.

Your ultimate guide to movies and series on the major streaming services. If you're a subscriber to Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, Max, Hulu, or AppleTV, Upflix is perfect for you!

With such a massive combined catalog (Netflix alone has 5000 titles), it can be challenging to choose what to watch. Upflix offers a solution that will impress you and help you navigate more efficiently.
  
- Be the first to know:
You'll receive notifications about content added to the platforms. If Netflix adds a new episode of the series you're watching, you'll know. If Prime Video adds a new movie to its catalog, you'll know that too. Upflix will keep you informed firsthand about the latest movies and series. Did you know that Netflix now has "Band of Brothers" and "The Pacific"?

- User-friendly Guide:
Upflix is a practical and simple guide. Everything is quick and straightforward, with no accounts or logins required. Just download and start using it. The only prerequisite is being a subscriber to Netflix or another streaming service that we support.

- Expert Reviews:
With Upflix, you'll have access to reviews and ratings from specialized websites like IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, and TMDB, which will help you decide what to watch. If Netflix just released a series and you're not sure if it's good, just check Upflix!

- Custom Lists:
Upflix offers two different types of lists: a wishlist and a list of the series you're following. If you're watching "The Witcher" on Netflix and "The Last of Us" on Max, you can add both series and be notified whenever a new episode or season arrives. That way, you won't miss a thing.

- Discover where to watch:
Not sure on which platform your favorite movie or series is available? Our tool allows you to save time and find where to watch your favorite content. Did you know that "Lord of The Rings" is available on Netflix, Hulu, and Max? And that HBO's "Ballers" is on Netflix? Oh, did you hear that Netflix removed "My Neighbor Totoro"? 
The Roulette is a premium feature and requires a subscription to be used.

The supported platforms are: Netflix, Max, Disney, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, AppleTV+, Paramount+ and Crunchyroll.

All film-related metadata used in Upflix, including actor, director and studio names, synopses, release dates, trailers and poster art is supplied by The Movie Database (TMDB).
Upflix uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New feature: trivia, fun facts, what critics are saying, and even who the movie or show was really made for. Like your smartest friend, if they actually let you watch.
Oh, and the app now looks flawless on Liquid Glass.

apps.title: AirMusic
apps.description:
• Featured as "New and Noteworthy" and "Staff Favorite" by Apple.
• Over 500,000 copies downloaded.
• Ranked in Top 25 Music Apps for 14 consecutive months.

Access and stream your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch Music Library directly over WiFi from an Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS3, PS4, Chromecast or any compatible DLNA device. No Wires or special hardware needed! It can even stream to a PC running Windows Media Player.

If you've heard all the hype about AirPlay and are missing out because you don't have an AppleTV, this app is for you!

◆◆◆◆◆ HOW TO USE ◆◆◆◆◆

√ Connect your iPod, iPhone or iPad to the same local network as your Xbox, PS3, PS4 or PC.

√ Start AirMusic.

√ For Xbox 360, navigate to the Xbox System Music Player and select your device from the list.

√ For Xbox One, navigate to the Xbox One Media Player under Apps and select your device in the list.

√ For PS3, navigate to the PS3 Music Menu and select your device in the list. If it shows nothing underneath, it probably means you selected the Movie or Photo menu instead.

√ For PS4, locate the Media Player in the Store.

√ When AirMusic detects a Chromecast device, an icon will appear in the AirMusic navigation bar. Tap on it to connect then select the music you want to stream.

√ For a PC running Windows, start Windows Media Player, your iPhone Music will show under 'Other Libraries'.

◆◆◆◆◆ IMPORTANT ◆◆◆◆◆

• AirMusic is not compatible with Apple Music.

• AirMusic is compatible with iCloud as long as songs have been downloaded onto your phone. Tap the little cloud download icon next to each song or album in the Music app to download them.

• If AirMusic is not detecting all songs, try toggling Sync Library under iOS Settings > Music.

• AirMusic requires an iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch with a minimum of 50MB of disk space to work effectively. 

• AirMusic is not compatible with old DRM songs purchased on iTunes. Newer iTunes DRM free purchases are compatible.

• When using Chromecast, you can choose and change the music directly from within AirMusic. For all other devices, you do it from these devices (ie Xbox, PS3, PC).

If you are experiencing any other issues, please contact us at airmusic@plutinosoft.com. We can't help you if we don't hear from you!

• Featured as "New and Noteworthy" and "Staff Favorite" by Apple.
• Over 500,000 copies downloaded.
• Ranked in Top 25 Music Apps for 14 consecutive months.

Access and stream your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch Music Library directly over WiFi from an Xbox 360, Xbox One, PS3, PS4, Chromecast or any compatible DLNA device. No Wires or special hardware needed! It can even stream to a PC running Windows Media Player.

If you've heard all the hype about AirPlay and are missing out because you don't have an AppleTV, this app is for you!

◆◆◆◆◆ HOW TO USE ◆◆◆◆◆

√ Connect your iPod, iPhone or iPad to the same local network as your Xbox, PS3, PS4 or PC.

√ Start AirMusic.

√ For Xbox 360, navigate to the Xbox System Music Player and select your device from the list.

√ For Xbox One, navigate to the Xbox One Media Player under Apps and select your device in the list.

√ For PS3, navigate to the PS3 Music Menu and select your device in the list. If it shows nothing underneath, it probably means you selected the Movie or Photo menu instead.

√ For PS4, locate the Media Player in the Store.

√ When AirMusic detects a Chromecast device, an icon will appear in the AirMusic navigation bar. Tap on it to connect then select the music you want to stream.

√ For a PC running Windows, start Windows Media Player, your iPhone Music will show under 'Other Libraries'.

apps.title: Red Bull TV: Watch Live Events
apps.description:
Go beyond the ordinary with the very best of Red Bull TV.

Get unrivaled access to your favorite sports, live events, music, and entertainment from around the globe for free – anywhere, anytime.

Follow your favorite sports without subscriptions.

Red Bull TV is constantly updated with new content and is playable on all devices with no ads, no in-app purchases and no surprise paywalls.

Watch livestreams and on-demand videos, movies and events from the worlds of motorsport, MTB, snowboarding, skiing, padel, climbing, gaming, dance, surfing, music and beyond. This means unrivaled access to athletes and leading names across Red Bull. Features include: 
•	24/7 streaming of the best of Red Bull TV – updated daily
•	Access to sports competition livestreams, replays and highlights in motorsports, MTB, surfing, skateboarding, padel, cliff diving, breaking, kitesurfing, skiing, snowboarding, running and MC battles
•	On-demand sports movies, shows, event highlights and the latest videos from iconic athletes
•	Save function for your favorite videos and movies which stores them in your personal library
•	Cast to screens from your mobile device

Watch in real-time and be there for the best high-octane sports moments as they happen, across events like: 
•	Mountain biking: Crankworx World Tour, Red Bull Rampage, Red Bull Cerro Abajo, Red Bull Hardline, Red Bull Roof Ride, Red Bull District Ride
•	Motosports: WRC, World RX, Dakar Rally, Drift Masters, MotoGP, FIM Hard Enduro Series, Red Bull Erzbergrodeo, Enduropale du Touquet-Pas-de-Calais
•	Water sports: Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series; Red Bull King of the Air
•	And more: Premier Padel, Natural Selection Tour, WSL, Laax Open, Freeride World Tour, Red Bull BC One, Red Bull Conquest, Red Bull X-Alps

Want a suggestion on where to start? Immerse yourself in some of our most-watched videos: 
•	Insights to the world of Formula 1: Red Bull Racing Road Trips, Ground Effect (2016), The History of the Pit Stop
•	Skateboarding: Skate Tales, LA Boys, Bones Brigade, Saturdays, 
•	Bike: The Engine Inside, Long Live Chainsaw, The Old World, North of Nightfall, The Moment, Return to Earth, Reverence 
•	Climbing: Reel Rock, 360 Ascent, The Last Ascent, Valley Uprising
•	Motorsports: Marc Márquez: All in, MX World, Jorge Prado: Feet in the Dirt, Behind the Bullet
•	Surfing: Life of Kai, For the Dream, And Two If By Sea, Riss, Shaping, Who is JOB and Exclusive Taylor Steele Catalog: Modern Collective, Scratching the Surface (Julian Wilson), Castles in the Sky, Se7en Signs, This Time Tomorrow, Trilogy; Innersection: Black, Innersection: Blue, Innersection: Orange, Here & Now
•	Volcom collection: Creedlecosm, Munch, True to This, BS!, Mr. Plant, Holy Stokes
•	Snowboarding: Layers, Range Finder, Chasing Winter, Driven, The King Snow Movie, One World, Art of Flight
•	Skiing: Legend Has It, Drop Everything, La Liste, Race the Face and many more. 

Go ahead and explore a world of action sports, inspiring athletes, and breathtaking action all on Red Bull TV.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: SYFY
apps.description:
Overview
	•	The SYFY app is the best place to catch up on the most recent season of your favorite shows, watch live TV, and stream movies and past season content!
	•	Download the SYFY app now to watch full episodes of The Ark, Revival, SurrealEstate, Resident Alien, AND MANY MORE!
	•	Get started by signing in with your TV subscription (cable, satellite, or digital). The SYFY app supports most TV providers, including DirecTV, Spectrum, Xfinity, Dish, and AT&T.


App Features
	•	Watch Your Way
	◦	Watch the latest episodes of new SYFY shows the day after they air on TV.
	◦	Live stream and schedule available 24/7 when signed in with your TV provider.
	•	Explore Versant Content
	◦	Access to on-demand content from across the Versant family of networks (including USA, SYFY, E!, Oxygen, MSNOW, CNBC, and Golf Channel).
	◦	Live stream your favorite Versant networks within the app.
	◦	Dedicated page for each network showcasing the hottest series.
	◦	Catalog of recent and throwback favorites available to watch.
	◦	Filter shows by network and genre while browsing. 
	•	TV Provider Access
	◦	Sign in with your TV subscription to gain access to the entire catalog of VOD and Live content.


Availability Notice
	•	Versant's family of networks are only available to stream in the US and US territories.
	•	Those outside the US will be unable to watch full episodes or live TV.
	•	If you're traveling, you'll regain full access as soon as you return to the US.


Comments or Questions
	•	Please reach out to support@versantmedia.com for assistance.
	•	Please note: Use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE, and Wi-Fi networks. Data charges may apply.
	•	Privacy Policy: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy
	•	Your Privacy Choices: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/cookies 
	•	CA Notice: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Means TV
apps.description:
Nearly all film and television made in the United States is produced by just 5 corporations. Means TV is here to change that.

Means TV is 100% worker-owned and ad-free, with a constantly expanding library of movies, original shows, documentaries, news and more.

Reasons you’ll love Means TV:

- A premium ad-free experience.

- Totally independent and completely subscriber funded. No venture capital or rich guys pulling the strings.

- Access to daily news content with an independent voice.

- Ethically sourced and human-curated library of content from around the world. No algorithms telling you what to watch or tracking your habits.

- A strict data privacy policy. We’ll never sell your data to make a quick buck.

- Watch at home or on the go. Enjoy Means TV on the big screen using AirPlay, Chromecast, or your Smart TV.

- We’re adding new content all the time! Browse new titles or search for your favorites, and stream videos right on your smartphone, tablet or computer.

- A subscription to Means TV helps to build a long-standing, worker-owned media infrastructure that reflects and empowers working class people.


SUBSCRIBE:

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Means TV on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.*

*All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle.

Means TV offers an auto-renewing subscription:

You'll receive unlimited access to content on all your devices. Payment is charged to your Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase. Pricing can vary be region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app.

Monthly Subscription automatically renews unless canceled within 24-hours of the end of the current billing period. You can turn off auto-renewal at any time in account settings, but you must do so at least 24 hours before the end of the current term. View renewal date, manage, or cancel subscription any time in Apple ID account settings.

For more information see our:

Terms of Service: https://means.tv/pages/terms-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://means.tv/pages/privacy-policy

apps.title: Shake TV - Best IPTV Streamer
apps.description:
Transform your phone and Apple TV into powerful streaming devices with Shake TV. Watch and control internet TV channels from anywhere in the world by adding stream URLs or playlists to this versatile IPTV Remote. Experience high-resolution playback with support for HD and FULL HD, including Airplay and Picture-In-Picture features.

Forget the need for multiple IPTV streamers or .m3u & .m3u8 playlist apps. Shake TV  plays any .m3u playlist and automatically fetches metadata for an enhanced viewing experience.

Take control of your entertainment with Shake TV's playlist creation and sharing capabilities. Whether it's your favorite TV shows, sports events, or live happenings, create personalized playlists and share them with friends effortlessly.

Our mission is to provide the best IPTV service, ensuring a seamless and convenient user experience. With Shake TV, you decide which channels to watch, how long to view them, and where to enjoy them. No hidden fees or long-term contracts—just customer satisfaction.

Please note that this application is exclusively for streaming IPTV live TV channels through an internet connection. The app relies on the content and functionality provided by you, as accepted upon download. We do not provide any media within this app.

Features:

- Stream Support: Enjoy streaming on your Apple TV  or Google Cast effortlessly. 

-Create Playlist Groups: Customize your IPTV experience by selecting only the channels you want.

-EPG (Electronic Program Guide) Support: Never miss an episode of your favorite shows with calendar integration.

-Multiple Format Support: M3U and M3U PLUS (HLS, MPEGTS, TS).

-Built-in High-Quality Player: Enjoy your streams with a top-notch player.

-Load Remote Playlists: Access your playlists from anywhere with remote playlist loading.

-Wide Network Connectivity: Wi-Fi, 4G, 5G, and HTTP protocol support.

-Background Airplay Support: Stream playlists to your TV or Airplay compatible devices while multitasking.

-Picture in Picture Support: Continue watching your favorite streams in a smaller window while using other apps.

-Share with Your Friends: Spread the love by sharing your playlists with friends and family.

Shake TV Ultimate is now live! Gain access to over 6000+ publicly available IPTV streams for a one-time cost. Start enjoying a world of entertainment today!

Disclaimer:

User Information: We handle user information in an intuitive manner while ensuring user access.
Copyright Notice: We do not endorse the streaming of copyright-protected material without permission from the copyright holder.
Law Compliance: Please refrain from engaging in illegal activities.

apps.title: WebCast TV for Chromecast
apps.description:
- Streams online videos to your Chromecast device on your big screen TV
- WebCast is totally Free (No In-App Purchases Needed)
- WebCast supports Chromecast 1, 2, 3, Ultra and Roku

[Steps]
1) Start WebCast Browser.
2) Connect your Chromecast.
3) Search videos.
4) Load the video page and play the web video.
5) Wait for the "Play Now" button and tap on it.
6) Watch and enjoy the video on your big TV screen.

[KEY FEATURES]
* Annoying Ads Blocker
* Chromecast Control Bar allows you to control the playing video on your TV (Play, Pause, Rewind, Forward, 30 Seconds Replay)
* Chromecast Video Queue allows you to add multiple videos to the playing queue
* Multiple Tabs Web Browser
* Full Screen Web Browsing Experience
* Bookmarks, Reading List, Browsing History, Liked Sites Quick Access, Search Suggestions and more

**iTunes movies or other DRM protected videos like HBO are not supported.

Fixed bugs

apps.title: Discover Streaming Originals
apps.description:
This app is an unofficial informational tool for finding Paramount+ Original shows and movies and their release dates, quickly and easily. You can't watch or stream shows and movies in this app, this app is an informational tool only.

Quickly find all scheduled Paramount+ Original release dates, then get notified about changes and updates to the show or movie, including notifications about your favourite actors.
 
With Originals you can be the first person to know about a new season announcement and release date!
 
Set reminders for your favorite series release dates.
 
- Notifications about new seasons and episodes, and production changes,
- Follow actors and get notified about new shows and movies they are in,
- Smart Subscriptions to help you save on streaming services,
- Track your shows/movies watched,
- Track watched progress,
- Follow actors and get updated on changes,
- Filter by Series, Movies or Documentaries,
- Notifications for new seasons, or part seasons,
- Notification when show is released,
- List of favourite shows, movies,
- Browse and Search for Original Shows/Movies,
- Browse by popular, rating, date, show or movie,
- Watch Trailers,
- Filter upcoming by date, title, media type,
- Filter by Release date,
 
 
Originals is funded by ads, if you choose to purchase Originals Pro to hide these ads, unlock Smart Subscriptions, Premium notifications, and unlimited favorites and follows, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Purchasing Originals Pro will not allow you to stream or watch any content, shows, or movies.

Privacy policy: https://paramount.originals.watch/privacy
Terms of use: https://paramount.originals.watch/terms
 
_________
 
Metadata, artwork and images are provided by TMDb, which is a community maintained movie database.
_________
 
Made in New Zealand
_________
 
Icons provided by icons8.com
_________
 
Disclaimer: This app can NOT stream or connect to Paramount+, and is ONLY an informational tool, using publicly available information, to help you keep track of all your favourite content.

This product and/or service is not affiliated with, endorsed by or in any way associated with Paramount+. or its products and services. Paramount+, and their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Paramount+.

Even more Liquid Glass updates and bug fixes.
raw_data.description:
This app is an unofficial informational tool for finding Paramount+ Original shows and movies and their release dates, quickly and easily. You can't watch or stream shows and movies in this app, this app is an informational tool only.

Quickly find all scheduled Paramount+ Original release dates, then get notified about changes and updates to the show or movie, including notifications about your favourite actors.
 
With Originals you can be the first person to know about a new season announcement and release date!
 
Set reminders for your favorite series release dates.
 
- Notifications about new seasons and episodes, and production changes,
- Follow actors and get notified about new shows and movies they are in,
- Smart Subscriptions to help you save on streaming services,
- Track your shows/movies watched,
- Track watched progress,
- Follow actors and get updated on changes,
- Filter by Series, Movies or Documentaries,
- Notifications for new seasons, or part seasons,
- Notification when show is released,
- List of favourite shows, movies,
- Browse and Search for Original Shows/Movies,
- Browse by popular, rating, date, show or movie,
- Watch Trailers,
- Filter upcoming by date, title, media type,
- Filter by Release date,
 
 
Originals is funded by ads, if you choose to purchase Originals Pro to hide these ads, unlock Smart Subscriptions, Premium notifications, and unlimited favorites and follows, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Purchasing Originals Pro will not allow you to stream or watch any content, shows, or movies.

Privacy policy: https://paramount.originals.watch/privacy
Terms of use: https://paramount.originals.watch/terms
 
_________
 
Metadata, artwork and images are provided by TMDb, which is a community maintained movie database.
_________
 
Made in New Zealand
_________
 
Icons provided by icons8.com
_________
 
Disclaimer: This app can NOT stream or connect to Paramount+, and is ONLY an informational tool, using publicly available information, to help you keep track of all your favourite content.

This product and/or service is not affiliated with, endorsed by or in any way associated with Paramount+. or its products and services. Paramount+, and their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of Paramount+.

apps.title: Chromecast TV Streamer #1
apps.description:
Watch web-videos, online-movies, livestreams and live-tv shows and your personal photos, videos & music by using Google Cast on your TCL TV, Sony TV, Hisense TV, Vizio SmartCast TV, Philips TV, Sharp TV, Toshiba TV, Chromecast, Nexus Player or Nvidia Shield gaming console. Enjoy the show on your big screen. 

With Video & TV Cast you can browse through the web and stream any online video on your Google Cast enabled device (movies, tv shows, sports, music and more). Just navigate to your favorite website and send the embedded video with a single tap to your TV or gaming console. The discovered video will be shown below the browser. A tap on the video link will send it to your Google Cast enabled device immediately. Streaming personal media from your device is also supported.

* The app only works with devices with Google Cast or Chromecast built-in, like Vizio TV, Toshiba TV, Sony TV, Philips TV, Sharp TV, Chromecast, Nexus Player, Nvidia Shield gaming console

* iTunes movies, Flash video and DRM protected videos like Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, Vudu, DirecTV, Xfinity, HBO now are not supported!

* Please test your favorite videos with the free edition before upgrading!

* The app streams only the video part of a website and not the whole website content (No screen or tab mirroring!). 

* Sometimes it is necessary to play the video on your iPad or iPhone first before it gets discovered by the app for streaming. 

* If a specific video does not cast, please check our FAQ. If that does not help, please give us a chance to help you by dropping a mail to info@video-tv-cast.com instead of leaving a negative comment on the App Store. We will try to add support for your video as soon as possible.


>>> UPGRADE FEATURES (available as in-app purchases)

* Premium Edition: Unlocks all of the features listed here. Also future features are included, so you do not have to pay for them when they are released in an updated app version. 

* Remote Playbar: A remote control that allows you to fast forward or rewind videos while browsing. It syncs across all your iPads & iPhones that are connected to the same Chromecast. So your video can be controlled by different users in the same room.

* Personal Media: Cast unlimited personal photos, videos and music directly from your device or from cloud services like iCloud and Dropbox. 

* Ad-Blocker: Blocks ads & popups on most websites and removes the sponsoring ads from the app. You can update and enable/disable ad-blocking at any time in the settings. 

* Bookmarks: Save unlimited website bookmarks. Synchronize and transfer them between different TV Cast apps and iOS devices by using backup and restore via iCloud.

* Subtitles: Display subtitles & closed captions on TV.

* Change Homepage: Set your personal homepage in the settings.


>>> A MESSAGE FROM THE DEVELOPERS

We want to say thank you for all your great support and kindly invite you to honestly rate our app. This helps us to keep up our app development and support for you. Please do not trust other apps that ask you for 5-star ratings in exchange for premium upgrades. This is against good developer ethics and also against Apple guidelines.

If you have any feedback, feature requests or other request, please notify us at info@video-tv-cast.com

Disclaimer: This app is not affiliated with Google, Sony, Philips, Vizio, Sharp, Asus, Nvidia or one of their products and trademarks.

apps.title: TrillerTV: Live Sports
apps.description:
TrillerTV streams premium live sport and entertainment to millions of fans around the world. Includes BOXING, PRO WRESTLING, MMA, SOCCER, and many more! Watch live and on-demand on any screen.

Watch premium live sport and entertainment from AEW, BKFC, Showtime Boxing, TopRank/ESPN, PBC/Fox, NJPW, Impact Wrestling, Rizin, Glory Kickboxing, One Championship, FIFA, and many more.

TrillerTV+ SUBSCRIPTION, THE BEST VALUE IN STREAMING SPORTS
Get the best value in streaming sports with a TrillerTV+ subscription, offering a regular slate of live programming and on-demand access to Pro Wrestling, Bare Knuckle, MMA, Football and other sports events. 

TrillerTV+ brings you Live & Exclusive football every week! AFC Champions League™ 2023/24, AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™, Eredivisie 2023/24, Liga Portugal Betclic 2023/24, and more stream Live for our football fans in the UK and Ireland. 

THE INTERNATIONAL HOME OF AEW PLUS
Get exclusive access to AEW weekly programming, including live and on-demand access to Dynamite, Rampage, and Collision, as well as other special programming, available to watch with no commercial breaks on all your devices. 
Enjoy members-only discounts on AEW pay-per-views and special PPV bundle offers. 

DOWNLOAD THE TrillerTV APP AND SIGN UP FOR FREE
• 1,000+ live events per year
• 10,000+ hours of on-demand programming
• Superior HD viewing experience 
• Multi-platform watch wherever
• Includes DVR, live chat, and free replays
• Multi-language on applicable events
• 7-day Free access to TrillerTV+ 
• The international home of AEW Plus

HOW TO WATCH
It’s your call - TrillerTV is available on your phone, tablet, desktop, Smart TV or to your streaming devices. Alternatively you can cast directly from your mobile to a compatible connected TV. Sign in to TrillerTV and kick start your viewing experience on any device or continue watching on any other platform using one account only.

Get the TrillerTV app now and join a community of 8M+ sports fans from around the world!
Sign up Free to discover great content and get exclusive offers.

***

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account on confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews for your selected subscription tier unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

Your subscription begins with a purchase. If you decide to upgrade or downgrade your subscription level, any unused portion of the current subscription will be forfeited. You may disable auto-renewals or cancel an active subscription anytime through your iTunes Account settings.

Still have questions? Head over to https://support.trillertv.com/

TrillerTV is owned by Triller Group Inc.

Terms of Service: https://www.trillertv.com/p/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://www.trillertv.com/p/privacy-policy/

apps.title: ZEE5 Movies, Web Series, Shows
apps.description:
Ready for an unparalleled streaming experience? Look no further than ZEE5, the world’s largest streaming platform for South Asian stories, where you can binge-watch the most trending titles.

Stream over 4000+ movies, 500+ originals, 2500+ TV shows, ILT20 cricket matches.
That’s not all. You can unlock and browse ZEE5’s vast content library with limited ads. Get ready to be transported to a world of spectacular stories and entertainment

What you will enjoy on the ZEE5 app:
● 4000+ HD Movies
● 500+ ZEE5 Originals
● The latest episodes of your favorite TV shows before the TV telecast
● Video content dubbed in 8 languages
● 12 display languages & 21 content languages
● Watch anytime, anywhere – download online & watch offline
● Live TV guide for channel programming
● Catch up on your favorite ZEE network shows
● Smart search including voice search
● Personalized content recommendation
● Seamless video playback
● 4k video streaming quality

Movies: Be the first to watch all brand-new movie releases. Want to discover films by genre or your favorite actor? You can find them all as per your preference. To watch your favorite Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Hindi movies, including other South Indian films in different regional languages, subscribe to ZEE5 today!

Watch popular movies on ZEE5: Bhagwat Chapter One - Raakshas, Madam Sengupta, Aabhyanthara Kuttavaali, Kishkindhapuri, Elumale, Aankhon ki Gustaakhiyan, Sumathi Valavu, House Mates, Fussclass Dabhade, Dakuaan Da Munda 3, Tehran, Maaman, Jarann, Bhairavam, The Bhootnii, Kaalidhar Laapata, Detective Sherdil, DD Next Level, Prince and Family, Costao, Sankranthiki Vasthunam, Mrs., Hisaab Barabar, Hanu-Man, Main Atal Hoon, The Kerala Story, Sam Bahadur, Kaatera, Gadar 2, Sirf Ek Bandaa Kaafi Hai, RRR.

TV Shows: Catch up your favorite shows anytime, anywhere. On ZEE5, you’ll find all the popular Hindi drama series and TV shows on ZEE, in Hindi, Tamil, Bengali, Malayalam, Telugu, Kannada, Marathi & more!

Popular TV shows on ZEE5: Tumm Se Tumm Tak, Kumkum Bhagya, Kundali Bhagya, Bhagya Lakshmi, Mazhi Tuzhi Reshimgaath, Sa Re Ga Ma Pa, Dance India Dance, Radhamma Kuthuru, Hitler Kalyana, Ninaithale Inikkum and more!

ZEE5 Originals: ZEE5 offers a diverse range of the latest web series to enjoy! Now binge-watch 270+ thrilling Originals at your fingertips!

Binge-worthy Originals on ZEE5: Janaawar - The Beast Within, Mrigaya: The Hunt, Shodha, Kammattam, Bakaiti, Mothevari Love Story, Sattamum Needhiyum, Viraatapalem, Ayyana Mane, Mithya, Manorathangal, Sunflower, The Broken News, Aindham Vedham, Gyaarah Gyaarah, Ayali, Mukhbir, and more!

WHAT TO WATCH: Explore a wide range of entertainment with hidden gems like Kakuda, Zombivli, Aranmanai 4, Brother, and more!
Best of International Series on ZEE5: Access the best of shows from across the globe. Watch amazing Indian, Turkish, Korean & Spanish shows on ZEE5.

Acclaimed international shows on ZEE5: My Golden Life, Friends: The Reunion, Mrs. & Mr Shameem, Churails, and more.

Live TV Shows: Stay up to date with access to 90+ live TV channels.

Kid Shows: We’re making childhood fun with an amazing line-up of content, especially for Kids.

Popular Kids’ shows on ZEE5: Love U Ganesha, Gadget Guru Ganesha, In Search of Titanic, Guddu, Dinofroz The Origin, The Jungle Book, Magic Ajji, Simba Junior: In New York & more!

Sports: Catch live matches, highlights, and updates from cricket, football, and more perfect for every sports enthusiast!

Watch Music Videos: Groove to the beats of the latest music with a vast library of music videos. Check out the latest pop releases, Bollywood songs, timeless melodies, party music and more!

Disclaimer: The availability of some content may differ based on content rights as per individual countries or regions.

Please refer to the terms and conditions for details: https://www.zee5.com/termsofuse

For details on the privacy policy, please visit https://www.zee5.com/privacypolicy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
What’s New

• Kids Profiles are here! A safe, fun space made just for the little ones.
• A better Streaming Experience, now see all Audio Language options right at the start of playback for easier language selection.
• Plus, bug fixes and subtle tweaks for a smoother, faster experience

Update now for the best ZEE5 experience!

apps.title: Logitech Mevo Multicam
apps.description:
Mevo allows anyone to live stream with ease. With Mevo Multicam, content creators can wirelessly connect multiple sources including Mevo Cameras, Mevo Go*, NDI enabled cameras* and more. Easily switch sources, live stream and record in 1080p HD to multiple platforms like YouTube and Facebook.

Switch between Multiple cameras 
With Mevo Multicam, you can wirelessly control multiple Mevo cameras at the same time and live switch between them. Multicam now supports NDI|HX* enabled devices, Webcam or UVC Inputs* as well as the mobile devices Built-In Cameras*. 

Instantly Stream to Your Favorite Platforms
With a few taps, you can stream instantly to popular streaming platforms like YouTube, Twitch and many more. *Subscribe to Mevo Pro to multistream.

Elevate your next Video Conference
Easily share multiple camera angles with your audience

Record in 1080p HD
Record your program output locally to your phone in full HD. Also record each individual camera feed directly to their local microSD card.

Add Graphics
Add custom graphics including lower thirds, corner bugs, and full screen images and video to elevate your production value.

Picture in Picture
Add an inset image or video over your main video to highlight parts of your story.

Advanced Auto-Director
Toggle auto-director and the built in AI will live switch the show for you.

Audio Mixer
Independently mix each camera's audio for the perfect sound

Control Each Cameras Video Settings
Adjust each Mevo camera’s exposure and color settings for a high quality live stream.


Premium Features
Get more Mevo with Mevo Pro subscription.

Compatible with *Mevo Go app, Mevo Core, Mevo Start, Mevo Plus and First Generation Mevo

Additional Support
Visit help.mevo.com

Footnotes
*Requires Mevo Pro Subscription

Terms of Service: https://mevo.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://mevo.com/privacy

apps.title: Yippee TV: Christian Streaming
apps.description:
** The #1 Christian Streaming App For Families **


WHAT IS YIPPEE
With no ads, no algorithms, and no attitudes, Yippee is the go-to, parent-approved app for safe, uplifting Christian family entertainment! With Yippee TV, your family can stream hours of popular, faith-filled shows without ads, algorithms, or attitudes. Enjoy hundreds of shows and thousands of episodes together as a family.


WHAT YOU GET
Stream Safe, Family-Friendly Shows like VeggieTales, Bibleman, Maggie’s Market, and Danny Go! Watch shows on Yippee from any device.


YIPPEE IS WORRY-FREE
A team of pastors and parents carefully reviews every show. While not every program solely focuses on Biblical teaching, each show aligns with Christian values. Yippee TV isn’t just a streaming service; it’s a trusted resource that helps build character and nurture faith in your home. Many parents choose Yippee to feel confident that what their family is watching aligns with their values.

The content available on Yippee may vary by region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.

For help with Yippee, please visit: https://help.yippee.tv/
We are here for you and your family! Email support@yippee.tv if you have any questions. 
Privacy Policy: https://www.yippee.tv/privacy-policy

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Yippee Entertainment on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://watch.yippee.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://watch.yippee.tv/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements

With Yippee TV, your family can stream hours of popular, faith-filled shows without ads, algorithms, or attitudes. Enjoy hundreds of shows and thousands of episodes together as a family.


WHAT YOU GET
Stream Safe, Family-Friendly Shows like VeggieTales, Bibleman, Maggie’s Market, and Danny Go! Watch shows on Yippee from any device.


YIPPEE IS WORRY-FREE
A team of pastors and parents carefully reviews every show. While not every program solely focuses on Biblical teaching, each show aligns with Christian values. Yippee TV isn’t just a streaming service; it’s a trusted resource that helps build character and nurture faith in your home. Many parents choose Yippee to feel confident that what their family is watching aligns with their values.

The content available on Yippee may vary by region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.

For help with Yippee, please visit: https://help.yippee.tv/
We are here for you and your family! Email support@yippee.tv if you have any questions. 
Privacy Policy: https://www.yippee.tv/privacy-policy

To access all features and content you can subscribe to Yippee Entertainment on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://watch.yippee.tv/tos
Privacy Policy: https://watch.yippee.tv/privacy

apps.title: VidAngel
apps.description:
Protect your home and family from offensive content in movies and shows. VidAngel lets you filter profanity, nudity, violence, and more.

Have you ever sat down to watch a show, only for an unexpected sex scene or barrage of foul language to send you scrambling for the remote control?
 
Over a million people have used VidAngel to skip the stuff they don’t want to see or hear in thousands of streaming movies and TV shows. With VidAngel, you set customizable filters for content such as profanity, blasphemy, nudity, adult content, graphic violence and more, putting you in complete control of the entertainment in your home.

How does VidAngel work?

• Sign up for a VidAngel account. We offer monthly subscriptions and you can cancel at any time (see our subscription and other end-user terms of service at https://www.vidangel.com/terms).
• Connect your existing streaming services–VidAngel works with Netflix®, Prime Video®, Apple TV+®, Peacock® and a number of Amazon® premium channels, including Paramount+®, STARZ®, AMC+®, PBS Masterpiece® and Britbox®. 
• VidAngel also offers a ton of original content from Angel Studios, including The Chosen and Dry Bar Comedy, all included with your VidAngel subscription.
• Set default filters for the stuff you never want to see or hear. You can also fine tune your filters each time you watch.
• Pop some popcorn.
• Hit play and enjoy the show on your Apple device, without the stuff that used to make you squirm.

Start binging with less cringing today, with VidAngel.


Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We've made it even easier to watch the things you love:
- In app ability to give feedback on your stream quality
- Bug fixes

apps.title: iWebTV PRO
apps.description:
Best Casting App! Cast any online video to your TV.

iWebTV® works with any TV equipped with Chromecast® + Roku® + Fire TV® + Apple TV® (4th Gen) + Samsung TVs (2018 and later models).

*** Feature Highlights ***

• HD resolution supported (1080p and up to 4K depending on the device)
• Unlike mirroring apps, iWebTV sends the actual video stream to your TV (Much better image quality & overall experience).
• Advanced browser, supports multiple browser tabs, blocks or hides spammy popups, search from the URL bar, ad blocker, browsing history etc...
• Subtitle auto-detect + Movie/TV Subtitle library
• Live streams support
• Video preview to instantly locate your favorite scenes.
• Binge-ready: queue up several videos, and enjoy.
• Set your own home page, bookmark web page or videos.
• Full playback controls, even after exiting the app (from the lock screen).
• Privacy modes


Some of the features above require in-app purchase

iWebTV actually plays the video on your media player which results in a much higher quality picture than apps that mirror your screen.



**** Notes ****

(1) Some premium features require in-app purchases.
(2) Excluding video formats incompatible with iOS (flash).
(3) While most video websites work well, email us from the app menu if you experience any issues: > “Get Help” > “Frequent Questions” > “Need more help? (Other Issues)”> “Contact Support” (opens email).

Smart TV from most TV manufacturers will work with this app without any preliminary setup. Just start the app, choose a video & hit the cast button! This includes TVs from Samsung, TCL, Vizio, Sony, Hisense, Insigna, Sharp, Philips and others.




**** Legal ****

iWebTV™ is a trademark of Swishly Inc.
"Chromecast" is a trademark of Google LLC.
"Fire TV" is a trademark of Amazon Technologies, Inc.
"Roku" is a trademark of Roku Inc.
"Apple TV" is a trademark of Apple Inc.



Terms:

• Privacy Policy: http://www.swishly.com/webtv/privacy-policy.html
• Terms of Use: http://www.swishly.com/webtv/terms-of-use.html

iWebTV PRO offers a subscription-based upgrade ("Premium Services" $0.99/month or $9.99/year). With this subscription you will get the additional benefits of 2 premium services (Cloud Proxy Streaming  + Unlimited subtitle downloads)

apps.title: Switcher: Live Streaming App
apps.description:
Switcher is an all-in-one multi-streaming & video platform built to fuel your growth. It’s a simple way to create professional multi-camera content and live stream to many social platforms at once—no pro equipment or tech skills needed. 

Whether you’re a church looking to grow, a sports team celebrating every moment, or a creator sharing your passion, Switcher has everything you need to level-up your live streams.

▶ “We saw our online giving increase, which allowed us to maintain our church expenses.” — Natalie June | New Greater Love Church
▶ “One or two people can manage a Switcher shoot versus a full 5- to 10-person team.” — Sarah Kelsey | Senior Manager, Smart Living
▶ “We can create quality content with Switcher that's on par with content people are making with these several-thousand-dollar setups.” — Alexander Sosa | Associate Pastor and Worship Leader, Life Church

▶ MULTI-STREAM LIVE TO EVERY PLATFORM AT ONCE
– Go live on Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, and more—simultaneously
– Live stream on your website and in private online groups
– Display live comments, slides, scoreboards, and more
– Invite up to five remote guests or collaborators to join your streams

▶ CREATE MULTI-CAMERA VIDEOS & STREAMS EFFORTLESSLY
– Connect up to 9 devices (like iPhones, webcams, or cameras) to capture different angles
– Switch between angles and edit your streams in real-time
– Use the Auto-Switching tool to automatically rotate between angles
– Display logos, graphics, text, photos, pre-recorded video, and more in real-time
– Use your graphics or customize pre-made templates
– Share multiple camera angles at once with split-screen, picture-in-picture, & grid layouts
– Share your screen and webcam at the same time
– Create multi-camera video clips in seconds and share them directly to social platforms
– Use the ChromaKey/green screen tool to replace backgrounds with custom images or videos

▶ EMBED VIDEOS & STREAMS ANYWHERE
– Transform your website with video players, playlists, & Netflix-style video catalogs
– Host ad-free, branded video content—no competitor recommendations
– Host up to 100 videos with no limits on length
– Brand your videos and player with your logo, colors, and graphics
– No website? Create a customized Netflix-style video watch page
– Track your growth with built-in video analytics

▶ GET HANDS ON SUPPORT FROM FRIENDLY EXPERTS
– Reach a real person on our US-based support team whenever you need help
– Get one-on-one setup support to hit the ground running
– Use our help center to find answers to your questions fast

▶ “We quickly realized the ease of using—and teaching others to use—Switcher for our church services and other events.” — Cherilyn Uthe | Faith Productions
▶ “I saw a 10% increase in subscribers almost immediately after I started using Switcher.” — Jon McLeod | Video Producer

In-app purchases:
▶ STUDIO SUBSCRIPTION
Includes the Switcher Studio iOS app for multi-camera production, multi-streaming, and social media clip creation and publishing.

▶ BUSINESS SUBSCRIPTION
Includes the Switcher Studio iOS app, PLUS browser-based features to host, embed, manage, and monetize your videos and streams.

To explore Switcher’s full suite of tools, visit switcherstudio.com
Have questions? Drop us a line! support@switcherstudio.com

Privacy Policy: switcherstudio.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: switcherstudio.com/terms-of-use
Compatible Devices: switcherstudio.com/compatible-devices

apps.title: Nero Streaming Player Pro
apps.description:
-------------------------------------------------------
Compared to Nero Streaming Player, this PRO version blocks all advertisements! 
* You can try Nero Streaming Player for free before paying PRO version.
-------------------------------------------------------

• Music streaming: play your favorite songs or playlists on your TV or connected speakers via WiFi.
• Photo casting: display your photos on the big screen – single or slideshow – with 4K support.
• Video casting: enjoy videos in Full HD & 4K on Smart TVs, Chromecast, Roku, Fire TV, and more.
• Stream from iPhone/iPad, PC & NAS: access and play photos, HD movies, and TV shows stored on your devices – no phone storage used.
• Stream from SMB share: cast network-stored photos, movies, and music – easy setup.
• Stream from iOS Files & iCloud: access media stored on iCloud Drive, OneDrive, and other cloud services.


The easiest casting app for all your media – music, photos, videos, and more!

• NEW! SMB Sharing: stream files from network folders directly to your Smart TV.
• Supports Chromecast, Chromecast Audio, Sonos, and many other devices.
• Stream by category: select all files from a location or multiple albums at once.
• Launch other Nero mobile apps directly from Nero Streaming Player.
• Send feedback easily for improvements and issues.
• Use your iPhone/iPad as a remote control: play, pause, stop, skip, adjust volume.
• Zoom & rotate photos with intuitive two-finger gestures while casting.
• Sort your music by artists, songs, albums, or genres and stream to Sonos or other supported devices.


Supported devices:
• Smart TVs from Samsung, Sony, LG, TCL, Panasonic, Sharp, and more
• AV devices from Yamaha, Onkyo, Sonos, Bose, Pioneer, and more
• Chromecast and other compatible streaming devices
• Media servers from Plex, Serviio, Subsonic, Twonky, Windows Media Player, and more
• NAS from Western Digital, Netgear, Synology, QNAP, Seagate, and more

PRO Features & VIP Privileges:
• No Ads – block all ads permanently
• Unlimited Streaming – browse and stream content from servers and YouTube without limits
• Advanced Player – support more formats, better quality playback
• Smart Casting – adaptive conversion for fast, smooth streaming
• VIP Customer Support
• Lifetime Updates – access all new features without limits

How it works:
Install Nero Streaming Player Pro to cast photos, videos, and music from iPhone/iPad to your Smart TV. No HDMI cable or extra hardware needed. Connect iPhone, PC/NAS, and Smart TV to the same WiFi network. Open the app, select media, tap the TV icon, and choose a device to enjoy your content on the big screen or audio system.

PC & NAS streaming:
Launch a media server on your PC/NAS. Nero Streaming Player Pro displays all available servers. Select one and stream all media to your TV.

No media server yet?
Download and install Nero MediaHome (2016 or later) on PC. In Nero Streaming Player Pro, one touch brings you to the timeline of all your photos & videos. Enhanced features include:
• Face recognition to view family & friends
• Explore places you’ve visited
• Browse personal movie & TV show collections with poster thumbnails
• Listen to favorite songs & playlists

raw_data.releaseNotes: Includes fixes for some issues

apps.title: Trubify: Live Music Streaming
apps.description:
Experience live music like never before! Watch livestreams, discover new artists, and join the growing Trubify community.

WELCOME TO TRUBIFY

Trubify is a totally FREE community-based live music app built around the streaming revolution.
 
ARTISTS - Earn 2¢ per viewer on your livestreams. Earn 1¢ per viewer on your uploaded and archived videos. Receive tips, schedule Concerts, and build your loyal following. Earn money for cover songs! Trubify pays you more per stream than YouTube, Spotify, or any other app! The app is 100% FREE!

FANS - Discover rising stars before anyone else! Interact with your favorite artists and their top fans. Watch live events or past performances for FREE!
 
WHY TRUBIFY - Connect, interact, and experience music like you’ve never felt before – anytime, anywhere.

JOIN - Meet hundreds of real musicians and their fans. 
 
DOWNLOAD NOW - And be part of the MUSIC REVOLUTION!

apps.description:
HeroGo TV gives you access to more than 1000+ new releases, catalog movies and TV shows to rent, buy or watch for free! Explore the most extensive collection of 4K UHD titles with easy access on TVOD or stream free movies and shows over AVOD and FAST.

We combined the best elements of TVOD, AVOD, and FAST channels so you have all the content you need at your fingertips - from news to latest movie releases.

Stop paying monthly subscriptions to one platform where you only really watch one show. On HeroGo TV we put the power in your hands so you only purchase the content you want or you can watch free movies and shows.

HeroGo TV Features:

TVOD
• Watch the latest new movie releases
• Explore our library of genres from cult classics to romance, comedies, horror and more
• Discover your next obsession worthy documentaries

AVOD / FAST Channels
• Stream free tv shows and channels
• Hours of entertainment for anytime and anywhere
• Catch up on the latest news stories

Stream Anywhere
• Watch content on any device
• Enjoy 4K UHD titles for crystal clear quality whether on your smallest or biggest screens
• Stream HeroGo TV on your phone, tablet, or TV so you never miss out

Download HeroGo TV today and experience the new way to enjoy movies, tv shows and more - all on your terms.

apps.title: Outside TV: Live Sports & More
apps.description:
All winter, stream the FIS World Cup Skiing and Snowboarding events from the US exclusively on Outside TV. 

Outside TV is the ultimate streaming destination for exclusive coverage of IRONMAN triathlons, FIS World Cup Skiing and Snowboarding events, and a massive library of:

- Live Sports: From world-class skiing to the best triathletes, catch the action as it happens live or with on-demand replays. IRONMAN Races, FIS World Cup Skiing and Snowboarding, USA Climbing, PTO T100, UTMB, and more. 

- Award-Winning Films and Shows: Captivating documentaries, inspiring stories, and amazing outdoor adventures. The legendary Warren Miller film collection of historic ski films including the newest addition “75” coming this winter. 

- Exclusive Video Content: Unlock premium films, series, and more with Outside+. 

- Adventure sports: Discover video content and TV shows to stream from your favorite sports, such as climbing, skiing, triathlon, endurance sports, cycling, mountain biking, hiking, and more. 

- 24/7 Live Feed: Stream the free live channel for a true TV-style experience of live sports, films, and shows.  

Available everywhere: On the go or at home, stream on all your devices.


Outside TV Pricing:
• Subscription 1 Year - USD 89.90*
* For non-US app stores, the equivalent currency charges will apply.
Please note: App subscriptions do not include access to subscription-only content on our website.

Additional Subscription Information:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

apps.title: Qello Concerts & Documentaries
apps.description:
Get ready to watch the world's largest collection of full-length concert films and music documentaries. Experience all the music worth watching, in one place, on all your devices.

Described by Forbes as "The Netflix of Concert Films and Documentaries," Qello Concerts by Stingray transforms any connected device into the ultimate live concert video experience. Give your favorite headliners a standing ovation anywhere, anytime! 
 
Featured artists include Queen, Pink Floyd, The Doors, Lady Gaga, Coldplay, Metallica, Nirvana, Tiësto, The Rolling Stones, Heart, Billie Eilish, Adele, Rihanna, Elton John, Foo Fighters, Kendrick Lamar, Paul McCartney, Beyoncé, Bob Marley, Linkin Park, Santana, Bon Jovi, Imagine Dragons, Gary Clark Jr., and so many more!

Download the app and start your Qello All-Access Pass for unlimited on-demand access to our full catalog of concerts, critically acclaimed and award-winning music documentaries, and top music shows, including MTV Unplugged, VH1's Classic Albums, Guitar Center Sessions, Front Row Center, and more. 

No matter how you choose to listen, Qello Concerts by Stingray's massive collection of performances in all genres and eras means no music fan is left behind!
Your front-row seat is waiting. Download Qello Concerts by Stingray today. 

After your free trial ends, your Qello Concerts All-Access Pass subscription will automatically renew at US$11.99 each month. It's risk-free because you can cancel at any time.
The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Qello Concerts Privacy Policy: https://qello.com/privacy_policy

apps.title: Gotham Sports
apps.developer: Gotham Advanced Media and Entertainment, LLC
apps.description:
Gotham Sports is the new streaming home for the New York Yankees, the New York Knicks, the Brooklyn Nets, the New York Rangers, the New York Islanders, the New Jersey Devils, the Buffalo Sabres, and more all in one, easy-to-use app. Access to Gotham Sports includes:
o Live games and full game replays
o Hometown coverage and in-depth analysis
o Award-winning original programming and exclusive content
o Play-by-play stats and Pick-N-Play predictor game with prizes
o Gotham Sports rewards program 

There are two ways fans can get access to Gotham Sports: 
1. Free with an eligible cable subscription:  
if you have access YES Network and MSG Network as part of your cable subscription, you’ll have free access to Gotham Sports. Just download the app, create a free account, and link your cable subscription account. 
2. Subscribe directly to Gotham Sports:  
if you don’t have access to an eligible TV subscription, you can subscribe directly in the Gotham Sports app.

Location restrictions:
o Gotham Sports will only stream games that are available on the YES Network and MSG Network. Local blackout restrictions apply.
o League and programming restrictions require Gotham Sports mobile & tablet users to turn on location services. Gotham Sports will use location services to determine what content users are eligible to view. Gotham Sports is only available in the continental US.

Please refer to Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: Larix Broadcaster: Live Stream
apps.description:
Larix Broadcaster is a professional streaming camera app for video and audio contribution using SRT, RTMP, Zixi, NDI, WebRTC, RTSP, and RIST protocols. It is built for mobile journalism, IRL streaming, remote production, and other live broadcasting workflows.

The app supports live streaming from iOS devices with high performance and flexibility. It offers H.264 and HEVC (H.265) video encoding, and AAC or Opus audio depending on protocol. It supports SRT in Caller, Listener, and Rendezvous modes (libsrt v1.5.3), with multipoint listener functionality. RTMP and RTSP are available with SSL (RTMPS/RTSPS). WebRTC is supported through WHIP signaling. Zixi integration provides AVC/HEVC support, SEI metadata, and Grove compatibility. NDI HX2 offers preview, Discovery Server support, and metadata setup with SDK 6.2.0. RIST streaming is supported in Push mode with Main and Simple profiles via librist v0.2.7.

You can configure multiple connection profiles and stream to several destinations simultaneously. The app includes a stand-by stream mode to launch in a paused state with different overlay settings. Pause is also supported to send muted sound and replace camera with alternate content.

Talkback is available via SRT, RTMP, Icecast, and SLDP, enabling audio return.

Larix supports UltraHD resolution and Dolby Vision HDR (via the HDR video menu). Both front and back cameras are supported, with live flipping, rotation between portrait and landscape, and hot switching. Multi-camera capture with picture-in-picture and side-by-side modes is available on iPhone XR, XS, and newer devices. It supports dual/triple camera setups including wide and telephoto lenses. Center Stage for iPads is also supported.

Camera controls include auto-exposure lock, white balance lock, manual color temperature, and pinch-to-zoom.


Adaptive bitrate streaming (ABR) is supported for SRT, with options for logarithmic descent, ladder ascent, and hybrid adjustment. Variable frame rate is also supported. ABR is disabled by default and can be enabled in the Video settings.

Bluetooth audio input and audio-only streaming are supported.

USB camera input is available on iPadOS 17 and later.

You can record streams as MP4 files, take screenshots, and save to iCloud. Recording customization allows higher resolution, alternate compatibility settings, and input gain control.

SEI metadata can be inserted into SRT, WebRTC, and RTMP streams for NTP sync using the Advanced menu.

Overlay features include GPS-based HTML overlays (requires Larix Premium), image, text, HTML layers, date/time overlays using Unicode LDML, and web widgets. You can assign specific overlays to live, paused, or stand-by states, and enable or disable layers while streaming.


Larix Grove enables easy sharing via deep links or QR codes. Visit https://softvelum.com/larix/grove/ for details.

Larix Broadcaster supports streaming to any media destinations including Nimble Streamer, Wowza, Red5, Flussonic, vMix, OBS Studio, and others. It works with major platforms like YouTube Live, Facebook Live, Twitch, Kick, Restream.io, Dacast, Cloudflare Stream, and more.

Larix Tuner cloud service support adds remote control, configuration backup, and session statistics. Visit the Larix Tuner website for more information.

Many features require a Larix Premium subscription. Premium removes the default overlay. It also unlocks multiple simultaneous outputs, Talkback, advanced overlays, ABR streaming, WHIP publishing, stream auto-start, USB/UVC camera support, and other. Learn more at https://softvelum.com/larix/premium/

Tutorials and documentation:
~ https://softvelum.com/larix/docs/
~ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dhj0_QbtfTw
~ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4jOJm0XNxZc

Join our public beta testing at:
https://testflight.apple.com/join/mdxzNOxZ

Larix Broadcaster uses Apple’s Standard License Agreement:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

apps.title: TIDAL Music: HiFi Sound
apps.description:
Get unlimited access to over 180 million songs in best-in-class sound quality with TIDAL. 

Enjoy the music you love and discover new tracks through our library of millions of songs, mixes based on your listening habits, and playlists curated both by TIDAL editors and other fans.

Try TIDAL free for 30 days, and choose from a range of plans suited to fit your needs.

All plans include:
- Millions of songs in HiRes lossless sound quality up to up to 24-bit, 192 kHz and Dolby Atmos
- Ad-free listening, unlimited skips
- Personalized mixes based on your preferences
- Editorially curated playlists 
- Offline mode
- Track and share your streaming activity
- TIDAL Connect, to listen in lossless quality on supported devices

Download the TIDAL app today to sign up for a subscription.
Subscription automatically renews on a monthly basis. Cancel anytime.

apps.title: ViX: TV, Sports and News
apps.description:
Disfruta de ViX, el servicio de streaming en español más grande del mundo.
Más de 100 canales en vivo y on-demand con novelas, películas, series originales, deportes, noticias 24/7, microdramas, podcasts, música y mucho más.

¡Descarga la app y empieza a disfrutar en todos tus dispositivos favoritos, siempre en español! Mira ViX donde quieras, cuando quieras.

ViX GRATIS - entretenimiento sin pausa
- Series, comedias, películas, documentales y realities
- Fútbol en vivo: Liga MX, Ligas MX femeniles, partidos clásicos
- Noticias 24/7 y canales infantiles
- Microcontenido exclusivo para ver en cualquier momento
- Podcasts en video y audio sobre temas actuales
- Totalmente GRATIS y sin necesidad de tarjeta de crédito

ViX Micro - historias cortas que enganchan
- Descubre nuestros nuevos microdramas en formato vertical, diseñados especialmente para móvil.
- Episodios de 1–2 minutos, ideales para ver en cualquier lugar
- Títulos como El regreso de la Heredera Fugitiva, Me fui gata, volví perra, y más

ViX Música y Fiesta Latina - lo mejor de la música latina
Explora ViX Música, nuestra nueva sección de contenido musical con presentaciones exclusivas, especiales detrás de cámaras y acceso a los mejores momentos de iHeartRadio Fiesta Latina, el evento musical que celebra a los artistas latinos más importantes del momento.

ViX Premium - lleva tu experiencia al siguiente nivel
- Acceso total a novelas, series originales y estrenos semanales
- Películas exclusivas en español
- Todo el deporte en vivo que te apasiona, incluyendo: UEFA Champions League, FIFA Club World Cup, Copa Oro y Copa América, UEFA Nations League, Liga MX y Ligas femeniles, CONMEBOL y CONCACAF
- MLB y más eventos internacionales
- Contenido sin anuncios (según plan)
- Visualiza desde múltiples dispositivos al mismo tiempo
- Planes mensuales o anuales — cancela cuando quieras

La disponibilidad de contenido y funciones puede variar según la región.

Términos de Uso: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Disfruta GRATIS de la mejor experiencia de streaming con nuestra última actualización de ViX. Esta incluye estabilidad general y corrección de errores.

¡Estate atento a más actualizaciones en el futuro!
